name: E3 Expo 2023
description: The Electronic Entertainment Expo (E3) is the premier event for the video game industry. It showcases the latest gaming hardware, software, and upcoming releases.

name: CES 2023
description: CES (Consumer Electronics Show) is the world's largest tech and electronics trade show, featuring cutting-edge technology and innovation.

name: BlizzCon 2023
description: BlizzCon is a celebration of Blizzard Entertainment's games, including World of Warcraft, Overwatch, and Diablo. It features game announcements, tournaments, and panels.
participants_amount: Tens of thousands of Blizzard fans

name: Google I/O 2023
description: Google I/O is Google's annual developer conference where they announce new products, technologies, and updates to the Android operating system.
participants_amount: Thousands of developers and tech enthusiasts

name: PAX East 2023
description: PAX East is a gaming festival that celebrates tabletop, video, and PC gaming. It includes gaming tournaments, panels, and an expo hall.
participants_amount: Tens of thousands of gaming enthusiasts

name: Apple WWDC 2023
description: Apple's Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) showcases new software, hardware, and updates for Apple products, including iOS and macOS.
participants_amount: Thousands of developers and Apple enthusiasts

name: Gamescom 2023
description: Gamescom is Europe's largest gaming event, featuring game announcements, hands-on demos, and esports tournaments.
participants_amount: Thousands of gamers and industry professionals

name: TechCrunch Disrupt 2023
description: TechCrunch Disrupt is a tech startup conference that includes startup pitches, expert panels, and discussions on the latest tech trends.
